tweet: First, our culture has indoctrinated us with the belief that it is wrong to be radical.
We’ve been led to believe that we will be more effective if we quietly fit into the society that we hope to reach.
Their unspoken message is, “It’s OK if you want to be a Christian. Just keep it to yourself.
Be subdued and reserved, and respect my right to live the way I want to.
” We’ve been led to believe that everyone has their own little “personal space” that we have no right to invade.
